UI icons (Icon font)

Around includes the collection of vector based font icons to use across the website. See the code example below:

  • HTML
  • Pug
  • Result
<i class="fe-anchor"></i>
i.fe-anchor
You can find the list of all available icons as well as their respective css classes here.
